sect1.title: This document
sect1.para: Warning: This document is deprecated and refers to old code. A new document is being developed, but for now the best source of information can be found on Sourceforge. This document may be wrong on a number of important issues, and it will definitely waste your time.

This document covers the configuration of OpenNMS. In the following chapter we will cover each file and what it affects. Some examples will be provided, however much of the contents of each is self explanatory.
